org.diirt.support.ca

Class JCADataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diirt.datasource.DataSource
      • org.diirt.support.ca.JCADataSource

  • public class JCADataSource
extends DataSource
    A data source that uses jca.

    Type support can be configured by passing a custom JCATypeSupport to the constructor.

    Author:
    carcassi
